description:
In one hour you can take your game to the next level and have fun doing it.

Anyone can play fantasy football, but if you don't know what you are doing it can become a complete hassle. Don't let that be you, for the price of a dinner that will fill you up for one evening, you can take this one hour class and instantly turn yourself into a FF mastermind. Trust me, being just as smart or smarter than everyone else in your league make it way more fun :)

This class won't bore you with every last detail of unnecessary information, this class covers exactly what you need to know and nothing else.

All you need is a basic understanding of football, a notepad of some sort and 1 hour.

You will wonder why you ever even played fantasy football without this knowledge. Don't let another day go by. Take an hour and start having fun playing this game again. And have fun winning!
title: Fantasy Football: How to Play and Have Fun
